workflow_schedule: <insert-cron-schedule> --1x/hour 15 min offset to latest chainhead run
<insert-cron-schedule> --1x/hour 15 min offset to latest main run
<insert-cron-schedule> --every 4 hours 15 min offset to latest main run
<insert-cron-schedule> --1x/day 5 min offset to earliest main run
<insert-cron-schedule> --1x/day 20 min offset to earliest main run
<insert-cron-schedule> --1x/day 20 min offset to earliest main run not overlapping with main curated decoder scores or other test jobs
<insert-cron-schedule> --4x/hour 20 min offset to latest main run not overlapping with main curated decoder scores or other test jobs
<insert-cron-schedule> --1x/month 20 min offset to earliest main run not overlapping with main curated decoder scores or other test jobs
<insert-cron-schedule> --1x/month 15 min offset to earliest main run
<insert-cron-schedule> --1x/week on monday early UTC time 20 min offset to latest main run
